DOC.brief_title: A Single Research Site Bile Acid Sequestrant Acceptability ( BASA ) Scale Pilot Validation Study
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate patient acceptability 2 dose orange-flavored generic Questran ( cholestyramine ) versus orange-flavored Tang Drink Mix ( commercial powder orange drink without cholestyramine ) via 2 BASA scale . A second objective ass 2 different version BASA scale . One version unweighted score base upon aggregate score acceptability component . A second version weight base upon subjectively-reported importance acceptability component . The one main study objective focus determine version BASA scale best differentiate patient acceptability bile acid sequestrant ( cholestyramine ) versus placebo control powder ( contain bile acid sequestrant ) thereby determine BASA scale best validated instrument future study assess compare patient acceptability bile acid sequestrants .
